title: City Shoes Altafs relationship to home village

content.question: Which of the following best conveys Altaf’s emotional relationship to his home village?

choices.label: “But Altaf could expect the children to hear his call” (paragraph 1)
“He would have been more comfortable travelling in a lungi” (paragraph 5)

content.answer: “He would have been more comfortable travelling in a lungi” (paragraph 5)

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
